text: John Scott was a Scottish footballer. His regular position was as a wing half.Jonathan Wilson, The Anatomy of Manchester United: A History in Ten Matches (2017) . P. 36. He was born in Wishaw or Motherwell. He played for Bradford Park Avenue, Manchester United, Hamilton Academical, and St Mirren.MUFCInfo.com profile Was awarded a military medal during the First World War.11v11.com == References == Category:Scottish footballers Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:St Mirren F.C. players Category:Hamilton Academical F.C. players Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Association football wing halves Category:Sportspeople from Motherwell Category:Scottish Junior Football Association players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Recipients of the Military Medal Category:British military personnel of World War I
title: John Scott (1920s footballer)
